title: matadoLage
sahitya:
matadoLge oLLe mata madhva matavu raghupati pUjA vidhnakke pAvana matavu idu pAvana matavu


caraNam 1    nArAyaNana nAma smaraNe nambidA matavu idu nambidA matavu pArAyaNake anukUla matavu 
tAratamyadi uddharisi shrutigaLanoreda dhAriNiya surara santOSada matavu
    caraNam 2    akaLanka shrI harige vajrAnkita matavu idu mudrAnkita matavu sakala dEshakke sammatavAda 
matavu akuTila sukha sanakAdi munIndrara nikhiLa kriyapadavIva nirmala matavu
    caraNam 3    sarasa sadguNa satya sAtvIkavI matavu idu shuddha sAtvIka matavu guru shiSyarige anukUlavAda 
matavu paramada khaNDisi paNDitaru pELida purandara viTTalana matave hanumana matavu
